SELECT player_id, game_id, score FROM Scoreboard WHERE score > 100

SELECT game_name, genre, score FROM Game INNER JOIN Scoreboard ON Game.game_id = Scoreboard.game_id
SELECT player_name, game_name, score FROM Player INNER JOIN Scoreboard ON Player.player_id = Scoreboard.player_id INNER JOIN Game ON Scoreboard.game_id = Game.game_id

SELECT player_name, game_name, score FROM Player RIGHT JOIN Scoreboard ON Player.player_id = Scoreboard.player_id

SELECT * FROM game;
SELECT title, release_date FROM game;
SELECT id, title FROM game WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT username, email FROM player;
SELECT id, registration_date FROM player WHERE registration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM developer;
SELECT name, headquarters FROM developer;
SELECT id, founded_date FROM developer WHERE founded_date > '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM review;
SELECT game_id, player_id, rating FROM review;
SELECT id, game_id, player_id, rating FROM review WHERE rating >= 7.0;
SELECT game.title, player.username, review.rating FROM game JOIN review ON game.id = review.game_id JOIN player ON player.id = review.player_id;
SELECT game.title, player.username, review.rating FROM game JOIN review ON game.id = review.game_id JOIN player ON player.id = review.player_id WHERE review.rating >= 8.0;
SELECT game.title, player.username, review.rating FROM game JOIN review ON game.id = review.game_id JOIN player ON player.id = review.player_id ORDER BY review.rating DESC;

SELECT game.title, player.username, COUNT(review.id) AS review_count FROM game JOIN review ON game.id = review.game_id JOIN player ON player.id = review.player_id GROUP BY game.title, player.username;
SELECT game.title, AVG(review.rating) AS avg_rating FROM game JOIN review ON game.id = review.game_id GROUP BY game.title;
SELECT player.username, COUNT(review.id) AS review_count FROM player JOIN review ON player.id = review.player_id GROUP BY player.username;
SELECT player.username, AVG(review.rating) AS avg_rating FROM player JOIN review ON player.id = review.player_id GROUP BY player.username;
SELECT developer.name, COUNT(game.id) AS game_count FROM developer JOIN game ON developer.id = game.id GROUP BY developer.name;

SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players ORDER BY player_score DESC;

SELECT player_name, game_name, rating FROM players INNER JOIN user_ratings ON players.player_id = user_ratings.player_id;
SELECT player_name, player_level, achievement_name FROM players INNER JOIN achievements ON players.player_id = achievements.player_id;
SELECT player_name, game_name, rating FROM players INNER JOIN user_ratings ON players.player_id = user_ratings.player_id INNER JOIN games ON user_ratings.game_id = games.game_id;
SELECT player_name, player_score, item_name FROM players INNER JOIN inventory ON players.player_id = inventory.player_id;

SELECT player_name, game_name, rating, achievement_name FROM players INNER JOIN user_ratings ON players.player_id = user_ratings.player_id INNER JOIN games ON user_ratings.game_id = games.game_id INNER JOIN achievements ON players.player_id = achievements.player_id;
SELECT player_name, player_level, game_name, rating FROM players INNER JOIN user_ratings ON players.player_id = user_ratings.player_id INNER JOIN games ON user_ratings.game_id = games.game_id;
SELECT player_name, player_score, achievement_name FROM players INNER JOIN achievements ON players.player_id = achievements.player_id;
